summary: Spirit Lake is unusually deep. No diver has ever managed to find the bottom, though many have tried. When Dr. Amelia Brooks disappears during a deep-water dive, her three daughters travel ... See full summary Â»
cast: Lindsay Burdge|Jennifer Lafleur|Aleksa Palladino|Beth Grant|Ross Partridge|Michelle Hutchison|Shirley Venard|Kaya Sakrak|Ebru Caparti|Thunderbird Dinwiddie
title: The Midnight Swim
